item.title: Hundreds of South Koreans detained in massive ICE raid at Hyundai plant
item.description: Most of the 475 arrested were from South Korea, leading the country to express concern about the rights of those in custody.

item.title: Google fined â‚¬2.95bn by EU for abusing advertising dominance
item.description: The Commission said competitors faced higher costs and reduced revenues as a result.

item.title: Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza
item.description: The video claims to show the two men in Gaza City, where Israel has begun a planned military takeover.

item.title: Putin rejects Western security in Ukraine, warning troops would be target
item.description: The Russian leader's refusal comes after 26 countries pledged to deploy troops to Ukraine in the event of a ceasefire.

item.title: Three ways Epstein scandal could go for Trump
item.description: This week the victims of Epstein's crimes came forward to demand more information, piling pressure on the White House.
